undergraduate.degree: Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science

earlyLife.childhood: Individual A was raised in Location 2 and later moved to Location 3. Their mother, Parent 1, was a teenager when she had them, and their father, Parent 2, was a bike shop owner. The mother remarried Parent 3, who adopted Individual A.
earlyLife.interests: From a young age, Individual A showed an interest in technology and inventing. They created a science fair project involving a solar oven.

earlyCareer.description: Individual A began their career on Wall Street, holding various positions at firms including Company A, Company B, and Company C.

founding.description: Individual A founded a major online retail company initially as a bookstore, which quickly expanded to become the largest e-commerce platform.

milestones.event: A major web services division was launched.
Became the most valuable retailer in the United States.

blueOrigin.description: Founded in 2000, a private aerospace manufacturing and spaceflight services company focused on making space travel accessible.

acquisition.description: Acquired a major newspaper for $250 million, revitalizing it with digital innovations.

bezosExpedition.description: Personal investment company of Individual A, invested in various startups.

philanthropy.description: Individual A has pledged significant amounts to charitable causes, including education and homelessness.

notableInitiatives.name: Day One Fund
notableInitiatives.description: Launched in 2018 to fund organizations helping homeless families.

notableInitiatives.name: Earth Fund
notableInitiatives.description: Announced in 2020 to combat climate change with a commitment of $10 billion.

netWorth.ranking: One of the wealthiest individuals globally

awards.award: Major Magazine Person of the Year
Lifework Award by the Space-related Museum
